hero.title: Transforming Lives with <highlight>Artificial Intelligence</highlight>
hero.description: From international video editor to AI education pioneer in Brazil. Discover the journey that brought us here.

aboutRicardo.title: Ricardo Faya
paragraphs: With more than 28 years in media and technology, Ricardo Faya is one of Brazil's pioneers in Artificial Intelligence education.
His journey began as a professional video editor, working at international companies like Fox International Channels and leading teams at FGV as Editor in Chief.
In 2020, after seeing AI's transformational potential, he started an intensive study journey, earning Google Cloud certifications in Generative AI, Machine Learning, and Prompt Engineering.
Today he is fully dedicated to helping professionals and companies master AI tools through a practical, results-driven approach.

certifications: Applying AI Principles with Google Cloud

webProduct.title: Web, Apps & Google Digital Identity
webProduct.description: Fast sites, PWAs, member portals, advanced technical SEO and the perfect presence in the Google ecosystem ‚Äî Maps, Business Profile, Search Console and Workspace integrated.

performance.title: 90+/Lighthouse Performance & PWA
performance.description: Next.js/React architecture with SSR/ISR, smart caching, lazy loading, WebP/AVIF images and load testing. Sites that become installable apps on mobile.

seo.title: Technical SEO + Google Business Profile
seo.description: Complete schema markup, dynamic sitemaps, green Core Web Vitals, lossless ranking migrations. Optimized Google Maps profile: photos, posts, Q&A, managed reviews and consistent NAP to appear in local pack.

cms.title: Headless CMS + Google Workspace
cms.description: Sanity/Strapi/Payload for content management. Professional emails with your own domain via Workspace, shared Drive, integrated Calendar and corporate security.

googleMaps.title: Google Maps & Local Pack Dominance
googleMaps.description: Your business appears when someone searches for you or the service in the region. Review management, responses, updated photos and weekly posts that increase clicks and calls.

workspace.title: Corporate Google Workspace
workspace.description: Email with your domain (e.g., you@yourcompany.com), unlimited Drive for team, unlimited Meet, Admin Console for governance and SSO. Professional image + productivity.

automation.title: Automations, Integrations & Smart Bots
automation.description: Process orchestration with n8n/Make/Zapier, integrations with CRMs, ERPs, billing, WhatsApp Business API and bots that converse, qualify and sell 24/7.

workflows.title: Orchestrated and resilient workflows
workflows.description: Process mapping, webhooks, queues, automatic retries, escalation and versioning. Each flow documented and monitored.

bots.title: Multichannel bots + WhatsApp Business API
bots.description: Customer service, lead qualification, scheduling and sales on WhatsApp, Instagram, Messenger and website chat. Human handoff when needed.

monitoring.title: Observability and governance
monitoring.description: Real-time alerts, execution dashboards, distributed tracing, structured logs and documented SLAs. You know exactly what's running.

integrations.title: Native integrations and APIs
integrations.description: We connect your CRM (HubSpot, Pipedrive, RD), ERP, payment gateway, email platforms and any REST/GraphQL API.

aiTraining.title: Applied AI, Agents & Training
aiTraining.description: From executive diagnosis to production agent deployment. We implement ChatGPT/Claude/Gemini in your processes, create custom copilots and train your team with hands-on workshops.

diagnostic.title: AI Diagnostic and Roadmap
diagnostic.description: We map processes, identify quick wins, assess hallucination risks and data governance. We deliver a plan prioritized by ROI.

agents.title: Agents, RAG & Copilots
agents.description: We design and implement autonomous agents, RAG systems with your knowledge base and copilots that assist sales, support and operations.

chatgptAoe.title: ChatGPT AOE ‚Äî Enterprise Operations Area
chatgptAoe.description: We configure your ChatGPT Team/Enterprise with personalized instructions, custom GPTs for each department, usage policies and sensitive data governance.

training.title: Tailored team training
training.description: Hands-on workshops, playbooks, optimized prompts and labs with real cases from your business. They leave using AI the next day.

contentVideo.title: Content & Video Studio
contentVideo.description: From strategy to publication: scripting, professional capture, senior editing, motion graphics and weekly packages that keep your brand present across all channels.

motion.title: Motion graphics & cinematic editing
motion.description: Animations, transitions, color grading and editing rhythm that captures attention. Optimized versions for feed, stories, reels, YouTube and LinkedIn.

kits.title: Multimedia brand kits
kits.description: Editable templates, bumpers, lower-thirds, thumbnails, quote cards and reusable assets aligned to your branding.

packs.title: Weekly/monthly recurring packages
packs.description: Editorial calendar, approved scripts, capture, review, subtitling and publishing. You just approve; we execute.

ads.title: Ad creatives and launches
ads.description: Sales videos, VSLs, teasers, ads for Meta Ads and Google Ads with A/B variations ready for testing.

FAQ.title: Questions? We Have Answers
FAQ.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our platform, courses and services.

items.question: What is FayaPoint AI Academy?
items.answer: FayaPoint is a complete AI education platform, offering practical courses, AI tools and specialized consulting for professionals and companies.

items.question: Do I need prior programming knowledge?
items.answer: No! Our courses are designed for all levels. We have specific tracks for beginners that don't require prior technical knowledge.

items.question: How does course access work?
items.answer: After enrollment, you have immediate access to all course content through our portal. Access is lifetime for paid courses.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), PIX and bank slip. We offer up to 12 interest-free installments.

items.question: Is there a refund guarantee?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a 7-day guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we refund 100% of the amount invested.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription whenever you want. Your access remains active until the end of the already paid period.

items.question: What is Studio AI?
items.answer: Studio AI is our AI-powered image generation tool. You can create unique art using text prompts.

items.question: How many images can I generate?
items.answer: Free users can generate 1 image. Paid plans have higher limits: Starter (50/month), Pro and Business (unlimited).

items.question: Can I use the images commercially?
items.answer: Yes! All images generated in Studio AI are your property and can be used commercially.

cta.title: Didn't find your answer?
cta.description: Our team is ready to help with any questions.

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.intro: By accessing and using the FayaPoint AI Academy platform, you agree to the terms and conditions described in this document. Read carefully before using our services.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By creating an account or using our services, you confirm that you have read, understood and agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our platform.

sections.title: Description of Services
sections.content: FayaPoint offers an AI education platform, including online courses, AI tools (such as Studio AI), community and consulting services. We reserve the right to modify, suspend or discontinue any service at any time.

sections.title: User Account
sections.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account. All activities carried out under your account are your responsibility. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All platform content, including courses, videos, texts and materials, is the property of FayaPoint or its licensors. Reproduction, distribution or modification without express authorization is prohibited.

sections.title: Acceptable Use
sections.content: You agree to use the platform only for legal purposes and in accordance with these terms. It is prohibited to share credentials, download content for redistribution, use automation to access the platform or violate third-party rights.

sections.title: Payments and Refunds
sections.content: Prices are displayed in local currency. We offer a 7-day guarantee for full refund. After this period, there is no refund for accessed courses. Subscriptions can be canceled at any time.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: FayaPoint is not responsible for indirect, incidental or consequential damages. Our maximum liability is limited to the amount paid by the user in the last 12 months.

sections.title: Modifications
sections.content: We may update these terms periodically. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through the platform. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.lgpdCompliance: In compliance with data protection regulations
Privacy.intro: FayaPoint values your privacy. This policy describes how we collect, use and protect your personal data in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

sections.title: Data We Collect
sections.content: We collect data you provide directly (name, email, payment data), usage data (pages visited, course progress), technical data (IP, browser, device) and cookies to improve your experience.

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
sections.content: We use your data to provide and improve our services, process payments, send relevant communications, personalize your experience, prevent fraud and comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Legal Basis
sections.content: Data processing is carried out based on the consent of the holder, contract execution, compliance with legal obligation or legitimate interest, as applicable to each situation.

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your data. We only share with payment processors, infrastructure providers, analytics tools and when required by law. All partners follow adequate security standards.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to: access your data, correct incomplete data, request anonymization or deletion, revoke consent, request portability and obtain information about sharing. To exercise these rights, contact us.

sections.title: Security
sections.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including encryption, access controls, monitoring and regular backups.

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: We keep your data while your account is active or as necessary to comply with legal obligations. After account deletion, data is removed within 30 days, except when required by law.

sections.title: DPO Contact
sections.content: For privacy questions or to exercise data rights, contact our Data Protection Officer at: privacy@fayapoint.com

Glossary.title: Artificial Intelligence Glossary
Glossary.description: Understand the main terms and concepts of the AI world.

terms.definition: Application Programming Interface. Allows different systems to communicate with each other.
OpenAI's language model capable of generating human-like text in conversations.
AI assistant developed by Anthropic, focused on safety and usefulness.
Numerical representation of text that captures its semantic meaning.
Process of adjusting a pre-trained model for a specific task.
Generative Pre-trained Transformer. OpenAI's language model architecture.
When an AI model generates false or invented information that appears true.
Large Language Model. Language models trained on large amounts of text.
Open-source workflow automation and integration platform.
Instruction or question given to an AI model to guide its response.
The art of creating effective prompts to get better results from AI models.
Retrieval-Augmented Generation. Combines information retrieval with text generation.
Basic unit of text processed by language models (can be a word or part of it).
Neural network architecture that revolutionized natural language processing.
Database optimized for storing and searching vector embeddings.
Ability of a model to perform tasks without prior specific examples.

Templates.title: Ready-to-Use Templates
Templates.description: Copy and use tested prompts for various everyday situations.

list.title: Text Summarizer
list.description: Summarize long documents while keeping the main information.
list.prompt:
Summarize the following text in 3 paragraphs, highlighting the main points and conclusions:

[PASTE TEXT HERE]

list.title: Email Generator
list.description: Create professional emails for different situations.
list.prompt:
Write a professional email with the following objective: [OBJECTIVE]

Tone: [formal/informal]
Recipient: [WHO]
Additional context: [CONTEXT]

list.title: Code Analysis
list.description: Review and improve your code with AI suggestions.
list.prompt:
Analyze the code below and provide:
1. Potential bugs
2. Performance improvements
3. Refactoring suggestions
4. Applicable best practices

```
[PASTE CODE HERE]
```

list.title: Post Creator
list.description: Generate engaging posts for social media.
list.prompt:
Create 3 post variations for [SOCIAL NETWORK] about:
Topic: [TOPIC]
Tone: [professional/casual/inspirational]
Objective: [engagement/sales/awareness]
Include: relevant hashtags and CTA

list.title: Video Script
list.description: Structure scripts for YouTube or TikTok.
list.prompt:
Create a video script of [DURATION] about [TOPIC].

Format: [YouTube/TikTok/Reels]
Audience: [AUDIENCE DESCRIPTION]

Include: initial hook, topic development and final CTA.

list.title: Study Plan
list.prompt:
Create a study plan of [WEEKS] weeks to learn [TOPIC].

Current level: [beginner/intermediate/advanced]
Available hours per week: [HOURS]
Final goal: [GOAL]

Include recommended resources and progress milestones.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers about our pricing and process
faq.q1: How does the quote process work?
faq.a1: After selecting your desired services, you'll receive a detailed proposal within 24 hours. We'll schedule a call to align expectations and adjust the scope as needed.
faq.q2: Are the prices fixed or can they vary?
faq.a2: Listed prices are market references. The final value may vary based on project complexity, deadlines, and workload. We always present a closed quote before starting.
faq.a3: Yes! We offer up to 12 installments on credit card or special conditions for full payment. For larger projects, we offer payment plans tied to deliverables.
faq.a4: It depends on scope, but most projects are delivered within 2 to 8 weeks. More complex projects can take up to 12 weeks. We always define clear milestones upfront.
faq.a5: We offer a satisfaction guarantee. If results don't meet aligned expectations, we work on adjustments at no extra cost. Your success is our goal.
